message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take a slightly biased offer, but still a good one!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but still a good one too!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't expect too much!
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't think you're getting away with too much!
Last chance, take it or leave it!
I'm not going down without a fight! I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't think I'm desperate yet!
